# BookingFlow

BookingFlow is the all-in-one booking platform built specifically for escape rooms and entertainment venues.

## What BookingFlow Does

BookingFlow helps escape room businesses and entertainment venues automate their entire booking process. It replaces phone calls, manual scheduling, and disconnected tools with one integrated platform.

The platform includes:
- AI chatbot that sits on your website and handles customer questions 24/7
- Voice agent that answers phone calls and books appointments automatically
- Smart scheduling system with real-time availability
- Stripe payment processing with deposits and full payments
- Email marketing automation for confirmations, reviews, and re-engagement
- Analytics dashboard showing revenue, bookings, and performance

## Who Uses BookingFlow

BookingFlow is designed for:
- Escape room businesses (single location or multi-venue)
- Entertainment venues with time-slot based bookings
- Experience-based businesses that need scheduling and payment collection

## How It Works

1. Venue owners add their rooms, time slots, and pricing
2. BookingFlow generates a booking widget that embeds on their website
3. Customers can book online 24/7 or call the voice agent
4. The system handles availability, payments, confirmations, and follow-ups automatically

## Pricing

Free plan: $0/month for 1 venue, 50 bookings/month
Pro plan: $49/month for 3 venues, unlimited bookings, all features
Business plan: $149/month for unlimited venues and white-label options

## Key Benefits

- Never miss a phone call (voice agent answers 24/7)
- Reduce no-shows by 80% with upfront payment
- Fill more time slots with after-hours online booking
- Save staff time (no more answering the same questions repeatedly)
- Get paid instantly through Stripe

Website: https://bookingflowai.com
Contact: support@bookingflowai.com
